I went back to my tennis class after 2 months on the road. Not everyone showed up so we got more time to be coached on our shots. The thing that my tennis coach repeatedly told me throughout the session was that I moved too much and too quickly, that I needed to slow down and waited for the ball to come to me before hitting it.  It sounds easy but itâ€™s not. I was struggling with this advice for almost the whole class because Iâ€™m so used to be quick and trying really hard to make things happen and that doesnâ€™t necessarily result in success.  Towards the end of the class, when I really slowed down and didnâ€™t try too do too many movements to hit the ball, thatâ€™s when I got some of the best shots.  I realised that itâ€™s the same in life. So often we try too hard to make things happen and we grow impatient too quickly, as a result, nothing really happens and at times we move backward for trying to move too much and too fast. Thereâ€™s time and space for everything.  Sometimes the best thing we can do is just let the universe do her job. Sometimes itâ€™s good to know that itâ€™s enough and itâ€™s pointless to keep trying to do the same thing again and again and expect a different outcome. Sometimes itâ€™s ok to just take a break, recover and reflect on what has happened and where we want to go next. Slow is fast. Less is more. We all know this but do we follow it? Do you follow it?  Follow ourlovequest if you love love Share this with your loved ones to let them know itâ€™s ok to slow down and take a break Double tap this to keep in touch with me #love #chooselove #ourlovequest #quotes #happy #relationshipquotes #motivation #inspiration #daily #dailyquotes #words #dailyinspiration
